entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023
